channel.title: Concentrated wine buff
channel.description:
Currently even though butler isn’t unique concentrated wine is a worse hunter bear with only two uses so I came up with a new thing
Anyone who visited you will be hungover tomorrow preventing them from using their day ability in addition to occupying everyone there

item.title: Concentrated wine buff
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Wait no it isn’t. Happy Hour is not an AOE ability

Read full topic

item.title: Concentrated wine buff
item.dc:creator: Dennis
item.description:
You do understand that the happy hour ability is a party with a target other than yourself huh?

Read full topic

item.title: Concentrated wine buff
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
But Party ISN’T just a weak Bear. It effects players besides attackers and converters

Read full topic

item.title: Concentrated wine buff
item.dc:creator: Dennis
item.description:
I agree with this, since the concentrated wine is a weak bear companion and a weak happy hour (only able to target those visiting the butler), thus this buff is well-deserved. Other than that, it goes without saying that drunk people would have a hard time using their day abilities the next day.

Read full topic
